statements: UPDATE user_access_logs SET access_type = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 123456;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET fingerprint_scan_status = 'Success', access_time = '2021-10-20 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 987654;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET access_type = 'Login', access_time = '2022-02-12 10:30:00', fingerprint_scan_status = 'Success' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET access_time = '2022-02-15 15:45:00', fingerprint_scan_status = 'Failed', access_type = 'Logout' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET access_type = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE unauthorized_scans SET scan_result = 'Suspicious' WHERE scanner_id = 456;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET access_type = 'Restricted' WHERE user_id = 123 AND scanner_id = 456;
UPDATE unauthorized_scans SET scan_result = 'Unauthorized' , scan_time = '2022-08-15 10:00:00' WHERE scanner_id = 789 AND scan_id = 987;
UPDATE user_devices SET device_os='iOS' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE unauthorized_scans SET scan_reason='Security Breach' WHERE scan_id=456;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET access_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 101 AND fingerprint_scan_id = 10;
UPDATE unauthorized_scans SET scan_location = 'Room A', scan_time = '2022-01-05 15:30:00' WHERE scan_id = 50;
UPDATE user_logs SET event_description = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE unauthorized_scans SET scan_location = 'Entrance B' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE user_logs SET event_description = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id = 123 AND access_timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE user_details SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET timestamp = '2021-08-30 13:45:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE unauthorized_scans SET user_id = 456, scan_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE scan_id = 789;
UPDATE user_access_logs SET action = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE fingerprints SET fingerprint_data = E'\x0123456789ABCDEF' WHERE fingerprint_id = 5 AND scan_id = 101;
